alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson County through 645 PM CDT... At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marianna, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Bascom, Kynesville, Blue Spring, Lovedale, Haynes, Dellwood, Star, Two Egg, Simsville, Cypress, Hornsville, Chipola Terrace, Buena Vista and Marianna Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
